name: NOOR
description:
NOOR is an adventure pixel-art game made in 72 hours for LudumDare42.

[THE GAME IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT!]

NOOR is born in an strange island. The island is all dark, but he has an special weapon! HE CAN SHOOT LIGHTS!

Stay in light and avoid darkness. Also find a way out of that island.

In your way to escape you may confront enemies. use darkness to your advantage and KILL THEM ALL!

 

Coding , Music , SFX , Pixel art , and Animation done in 72 hours by:

PEYMAN GHASEMI

 

Check out the post-jam version with some features improved!

 

HOPE YOU ENJOY IT!
